page.title: 13MOVING INTO WINDRUSH
page.content: My name is Rebecca Louise Dooley.I'm nine years old and was born in Wales.I have two brothers.Mum is from Yorkshire and my dad comes from Lancashire.Two years ago dad became Editor of the Gloucestershire Echo,and we moved into Windrush.We have always lived in the country,but never in such a small village as Windrush.We have to drive for our shopping,which is tiresome and expensive.The countryside is pretty,but very tame after Wales,and difficult to walk in as all the land is farmed.One thing we all dislike about our village is that it is heavily populated by weekenders, which means many houses are left empty for long periods and there is little sense of community.Soon we are going to move to Cheltenham,I shall miss my school friends but I shall not be sorry to leave Windrush.
